Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.reggert.reb4j.AbstractExpression
      • io.github.reggert.reb4j.AbstractAlternative
        • io.github.reggert.reb4j.AbstractSequenceableAlternative
          • io.github.reggert.reb4j.AbstractQuantifiableSequenceableAlternative
            • io.github.reggert.reb4j.Group
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Alternative, Expression, Quantifiable, Sequenceable, Serializable

    public final class Group
extends AbstractQuantifiableSequenceableAlternative
implements Quantifiable
    Expression that has been grouped in parentheses.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
